question: [File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/token_models/token_datas.rs] [Function: from_write_table_item()] [Concurrent processing] Can multiple indexer threads process the same token_data_id concurrently, causing race conditions in CurrentTokenData updates that lose supply changes? (High)
